content: www emysyarns com sales@emysyarns com 619-691-1657 261 broadway chula vista ca corner-to-corner crochet baby blanket description a simple crochet stitch results in a series blocks crocheted from corner-to-corner add interest with a variegated or self-striping yarn finished size approximately 30 square materials ● yarn painted mist by knitting fever ○ 3 balls 820 yds ● hook h/8 5mm picture by emy s yarns abbreviations chain chain double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch chain-3 space chain-3 space previously made free pattern friday series published 10-27-17 p 1 www emysyarns com sales@emysyarns com 619-691-1657 261 broadway chula vista ca instructions ● chain 6 ● row 1 rs 1 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook counts as chain-3 and double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each of next 2 chain turn 1 block made ● row 2 chain 6 1 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook 1 double_crochet in each of next 2 chain beg block made skip next 3 double_crochet slip_stitch chain 3 3 double_crochet in next chain-3 space block made ● turn 2 blocks made ● row 3 beg block block twice turn 3 blocks ● row 4 beg block block 3 times turn 4 blocks ● row 5 beg block block 4 times turn 5 blocks ● continue increasing 1 block each row as established until left side from beg measures 30 or the desired width ● begin decreasing ● next row slip_stitch in each of next 3 double_crochet block in each chain-3 space to last chain-3 space sl st in last chain-3 space turn ● repeat last row until 1 block remains ● fasten_off free pattern friday series published 10-27-17 p 2
